name: Rick O'Shea - No Time To Play
name_original: Rick O'Shea - No Time To Play
description:
HOW TO PLAY : 

Click the blue 'Play' text (not an obvious button)

Use common commands like 'talk to', 'look at', 'pick up', 'drive to'.

When talking to a witness, ask questions with the right key words, they might reveal more information.

Type 'stop talking' to leave the witness.

Type 'Accuse' along with the name of the suspect you think is the killer.

Another RanDome game. The theme for this was 'Ricochet', so we created a character named Rick O'Shea, a detective on a case to figure out how 3 murders could have happened in one night, and only one murder had a bullet. 

Can you solve the case?

Comment below with your thoughts.

All source and assets for this game and more -> https://ko-fi.com/s/f2cc55ff3a
